About

Noita is a Jekyll theme built with the responsive front-end framework Foundation. The theme is free and fully compatible with Github Pages.

Quick Guide

The fastest way is to use Github Pages:

  1. Fork the repository.
  2. Set up your custom domain.
  3. Start blogging.

Performance

Performance tests made with Web Pagetest:

  • Mobile
  • Desktop

Validation

Noita creates pages with valid:

  • markup;
  • internal and external links;
  • image references.

Dependencies

Noita contains free libraries:

  • Foundation
  • jQuery
  • Normalize
